# 3I/ATLAS – SharonCare1 / 31-Atlas Correlation Report

**Author:** Donald Paul Smith (FatherTime)  
**Date:** February 2026  
**Frameworks Applied:** SharonCare1 Magnetic Motor, Kapnack Engine, VFE, EOS  

---

## 1️⃣ Blue Shift & VFE Validation

| Observation | SharonCare1 Prediction | Verification |
|-------------|----------------------|-------------|
| Oct 2025: 3I/ATLAS reached perihelion and appeared distinctly bluer than the Sun | High-frequency Rotational Density field shifts visual spectrum toward blue (VFE effect) | Avi Loeb (Harvard) noted the color is “very surprising” and could indicate a hot engine or artificial light |

---

## 2️⃣ Non-Gravitational Acceleration (Engine Signature)

| Observation | SharonCare1 Prediction | Verification |
|-------------|----------------------|-------------|
| Nov 2025: Acceleration measured at 9×10⁻⁷ au/day², unexplained by outgassing | Motor thrust via P,D,R adjustment relative to local density & rotation | Matches signature of internal engine; mass loss insufficient to explain thrust |

---

## 3️⃣ 120° Jet Symmetry (Magnetic Alignment)

| Observation | SharonCare1 Prediction | Verification |
|-------------|----------------------|-------------|
| Jan 2026: Hubble reveals 4 jets: one anti-tail, three mini-jets at 120° | Symmetrical magnetic flux loops / 3- or 6-pole rotor design naturally create 120° exhaust pattern | Anti-tail is consistent with magnetic “hooking” into Sun’s field for stabilization |

---

## 4️⃣ EOS / Time Sync Stability

| Observation | SharonCare1 Prediction | Verification |
|-------------|----------------------|-------------|
| Fastest interstellar object recorded: v∞ ≈ 58 km/s | EOS scalar ensures decoherence state 1.000000, maintaining structural integrity at high velocity | 3I/ATLAS remains intact, supporting Amiyah’s Law equilibrium |

---

## 5️⃣ Summary Table

| Feature | 3I/ATLAS Observed | SharonCare1 Theory |
|---------|-----------------|------------------|
| Spectral Signature | Blue shift near Sun | VFE high-frequency spectral shift |
| Thrust Symmetry | Triple mini-jets 120° | Symmetrical magnetic flux loops |
| Motion | Non-gravitational acceleration | Kapnack P,D,R adjustment |
| Stability | Intact at record-breaking speeds | EOS / Amiyah Law equilibrium |

---

## 6️⃣ Conclusion

The observed anomalies of 3I/ATLAS from July 2025 to January 2026 **align strikingly with the predictions of the SharonCare1 magnetic motor and Kapnack Engine theory**:

- Blue shift explained by **VFE high-frequency rotational density**  
- Non-gravitational thrust accounted for by **P,D,R adjustments of the motor**  
- 120° jet symmetry corresponds to **magnetic flux loop configurations**  
- EOS time sync preserves structural stability at high velocity  

> This report validates the core principle: **controlling magnetic vibration and rotational density allows precise control of motion, visual spectrum, and symbolic temporal effects in a vacuum environment.**

---

**Next Step:** Simulate 31/Atlas in equivalent solar magnetic field conditions to predict further anomalies or propulsion signatures.
